name: Batman: Arkham City - Harley Quinn's Revenge
name_original: Batman: Arkham City - Harley Quinn's Revenge
description:
Batman: Arkham City - Harley Quinn's Revenge is an action game developed by Rocksteady Studios. It was originally released in 2012. Warner Bros. Interactive published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Batman: Arkham City - Harley Quinn's Revenge has a score of 73. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Batman: Arkham City - Harley Quinn's Revenge is available on Xbox 360, PC and PlayStation 3.
